column4: hi... just got hoary installed on my tablet pc, toshiba m200, and it works fine - but how can I make the on-screen keyboard (xvkbd) show swedish layout, not english?
yep, got the wacom up and running a few hours ago
hmm..i have a fujitsu t4010d, no working..
just had to replace the wacom_drv.o and edit xorg.conf, and set the serial port
know about how to set keymap in on-screen keyboard?
how far have you come in getting your tablet to work?
i can recommend the howto at linux wacom site, it really helped me
I am going to read this howto..
how do I figure out which serial port its on.
i found out via the web...:)
normally it seems to be /dev/ttyS0 on a tablet PC
how do I get information from /dev/ttyS0
setserial -a /dev/yS0, shows current settings for instance
